enableSynctex.title: Enable SyncTeX
enableSynctex.description: Enable SyncTeX for forward and backward search between source and PDF. Required for pdf-viewer synctex features.

cleanAuxFiles.title: Clean auxiliary files after build
cleanAuxFiles.description: Remove auxiliary files (.aux, .log, .out, etc.) after successful compilation.

shellEscape.title: Enable shell escape
shellEscape.description: Enable shell escape (-shell-escape) for packages that need to execute external commands. WARNING: Only enable for trusted documents.
